casebody.data:
New York, Ontario & Western Railway Company and Axel Petersen, Libelants-Appellants, v. THE S. S. EL ORIENTE and Southern Pacific Company, Claimant-Appellee, and THE Steam Tug BEAR, Her Engines, etc., Cornell Steamboat Company, Claimant-Appellee. No. 93. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 1, 1930. Alexander, Ash & Jones, of New York City (Edward Ash and Max Taylor, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. Burlingham, Veeder, Fearey, Clark & Hupper, of New York City (Chauncey I. Clark and Stanley R. Wright, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellees.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree [39 F.(2d) 930] affirmed.
